definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: zi4 ran2 ke1 xue2 ji1 jin1 hui4

sentences.english: Environmental capacity is a natural science nomenclature to describe the pollution capacity that accommodated by the environmental stuffs.
sentences.chinese: 环境容量是描述环境要素纳污能力的自然科学表述。

sentences.english: It denies that any essential differences exist between the natural sciences and the sciences of human action.
sentences.chinese: 他们否定了自然科学和人类行为科学的本质区别。

sentences.english: This is the website of Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences at the Leiden University.
sentences.chinese: 这是莱顿大学数学与自然科学学院的网站。

sentences.english: Both informatics knowledge and natural science knowledge have reflexivity.
sentences.chinese: 情报学知识与自然科学知识都具有反身性。

sentences.english: From cookbooks to natural sciences, you can find texts on just about any subject.
sentences.chinese: 从烹饪图书到自然科学，你可以找到所有科目的内容。

sentences.english: This research is one of programs of Natural Science Fundation Committee of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 本研究是内蒙古自治区自然科学基金课题。

sentences.english: Basides, author's self-citation rates in disciplines of humanities and social sciences were lower than natural sciences.
sentences.chinese: 而且，人文社会科学著者自引率比自然科学要低。

sentences.english: The lack of hard science is enough to scare off my friend.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏自然科学常识足以使我的朋友望而却步了。

sentences.english: Zhang, Xu like science, welcome to my website.
sentences.chinese: 张旭，喜爱自然科学，欢迎您光临我的个人网站。

sentences.english: The Neuro-Science and Information-Science are two hotspots in the study of Natural-Science in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 神经科学和信息科学是当今自然科学研究的两大热点。

sentences.english: I'm Zhang, Xu, a science amateur, welcome to my website.
sentences.chinese: 我是张旭，自然科学爱好者，欢迎光临我的个人网站。

sentences.english: J. W. Goethe, 1817, Principles of Natural Science.
We will visit the science museum in Taichung.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去台中的自然科学博物馆。

sentences.english: The degree programme is full-time only and is based at the Durham city campus.
sentences.chinese: 自然科学学位课程是全日制课程，在杜伦市校区授课。

sentences.english: The first half of the 19th century, science has made great achievements.
sentences.chinese: 十九世纪上半期，自然科学已取得了伟大的成就。

pinyin: ren2 wen2 she4 hui4 xue2 ke1
